    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_794b880cb39dda4b33fb06605df6f1cf7742eb23</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Things containing harmful chemicals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sachen, die schädliche Chemikalien enthalten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses contenant les produits chimiques nocifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas que contêm produtos químicos 
prejudiciais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cose che contengono i prodotti chimici nocivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα που περιέχουν τις επιβλαβείς χημικές ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosas que contienen los productos químicos 
dañosos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First in a series of three illustrations showing some things which contain harmful chemicals or substances. Shown here are bottles filled with glue and spray paint.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">harm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spray paints</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von drei Abbildungen, die 
einigen Sachen zeigen, welche schädliche Chemikalien oder Substanzen 
enthalten. Hier gezeigt die Flaschen, die mit Kleber und 
Sprayfarbe gefüllt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord dans une série de trois illustrations 
montrant à quelques choses ce qui contiennent les produits chimiques 
nocifs ou les substances. Montrées ici sont des bouteilles 
remplies de colle et de peinture de jet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de três 
ilustrações que mostram a algumas coisas quais contêm produtos 
químicos prejudiciais ou substâncias. São mostrados aqui os 
frascos enchidos com a colagem e a pintura de pulverizador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano ad alcune cose quale contengono i prodotti chimici nocivi o 
le sostanze. Sono indicate qui le bottiglie riempite di colla e 
di vernice di spruzzo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα σε μία σειρά τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν
μερικά πράγματα που περιέχουν τις επιβλαβείς χημικές ουσίες ή 
τις ουσίες. Εμφανισμένα εδώ είναι τα μπουκάλια που 
γεμίζουν με το χρώμα κόλλας και ψεκασμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran a algunas cosas cuáles contienen los productos químicos 
dañosos o las sustancias. Se muestran aquí las botellas 
llenadas de pegamento y de pintura de aerosol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">klebt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösungsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
